00007 /* The onboard keyboard contains rectangles for all of the individual keys of
00008  * a 104-key keyboard layed out.  This draws the rectangles for each keyboard
00009  * button so when you click on the key, the correct one will highlight.
00010  */
00011 KEYBOARD_POS keyb_pos_104[] =
00012 {
00013         /* Format:
00014          *   x (left) coordinate
00015          *   y (top) coordinate
00016          *   w (width) of key in 1/4 increments
00017          *   h (height) of key in 1/4 increments
00018          *
00019          * To have a button of "width 1", specify a 4 (as 4 * 1/4 = 1).  This is
00020          * done so we can have smaller (like those in the top-right corner) or
00021          * larger (like the ENTER or BACKSPACE keys) squares.
00022          */
00023 
00024         { -1, -1,92,27}, // Outline of the keyboard
00025 
00026         { 7,13,4,4},  //A
00027         {25,17,4,4},  //B
00028         {17,17,4,4},  //C
00029         {15,13,4,4},  //D
00030         {14, 9,4,4},  //E
00031         {19,13,4,4},  //F
00032         {23,13,4,4},  //G
00033         {27,13,4,4},  //H

00178 int choose_mode = 0;  /* 0 = table,  1 = sequence (choose all in turn) */

00180 
00181 void draw_keycap_text(float x, float y, int c)
00182 {
00183     ALLEGRO_COLOR white = al_map_rgba_f(1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 1);
00184 
00185         al_set_blender(ALLEGRO_ALPHA, ALLEGRO_INVERSE_ALPHA, white );
00186 
00187         if (c >= ALLEGRO_KEY_0 && c <= ALLEGRO_KEY_9)
00188         {
00189                 al_font_textout(small_font, x + 2, y + 16, al_keycode_to_name(c), -1 );
00190         }
00191         if (c >= ALLEGRO_KEY_A && c <= ALLEGRO_KEY_Z)
00192         {
00193                 al_font_textout(large_font, x + 2, y, al_keycode_to_name(c), -1 );
00194         }
00195 }

00212 void
00213 draw_virtual_keyboard(KEYBOARD_POS* keypos, float x_pos, float y_pos, float x_scale, float y_scale)
00214 {
00215     ALLEGRO_COLOR green = al_map_rgba_f(0, 0.75, 0, 1);
00216     ALLEGRO_COLOR bright = al_map_rgba_f(0.50, 1.0, 0.50, 1);
00217         ALLEGRO_COLOR white = al_map_rgba_f(1, 1, 1, 1);
00218 
00219         ALLEGRO_KEYBOARD_STATE state;
00220         al_get_keyboard_state(&state);
00221 
00222         int n = 0;
00223         float x, y, w, h;
00224 
00225         /* We get to the end of the keypos array when the width is set to 0. */
00226         while ((keypos->w != 0) && n < 128)
00227         {
00228                 x=keypos->x * x_scale + x_pos;
00229                 y=keypos->y * y_scale + y_pos;
00230                 w=keypos->w * x_scale;
00231                 h=keypos->h * y_scale;
00232 
00233         //      if (n==1) printf("x %f,%f,%f,%f ", x, y, w, h);
00234 
00235                 /* Fill in "active" keys */
00236                 al_set_blender(ALLEGRO_ALPHA, ALLEGRO_INVERSE_ALPHA, (al_key_down(&state, n)) ? white : bright );
00237                 al_draw_rectangle( x, y, x+w-2, y+h-2, al_map_rgb(200, 200, 200), 1);
00238 
00239                 /* Darker key border */
00240                 al_set_blender(ALLEGRO_ALPHA, ALLEGRO_INVERSE_ALPHA, green );
00241                 al_draw_rectangle( x+1, y+1, x+w-1, y+h-1, al_map_rgb(200, 200, 200), 0);
00242 
00243                 /* Lighter key border (gives a nice 3D look */
00244                 al_set_blender(ALLEGRO_ALPHA, ALLEGRO_INVERSE_ALPHA, white );
00245                 al_draw_rectangle( x, y, x+w-2, y+h-2, al_map_rgb(200, 200, 200), 0);
00246 
00247                 draw_keycap_text(x+2, y, n);
00248                 ++keypos;
00249                 ++n;
00250         }
00251 
00252         //printf("\n");
00253 }
00254 
00255 
00274 void
00275 draw_keyselect_table(GAME_CONTROL_DEFS* defs, int n, int scroll_n,
00276                                          ALLEGRO_FONT* font, int x_pos, int y_pos)
00277 {
00278     int a;
00279     int c1, c2, c3;
00280     ALLEGRO_COLOR bright = al_map_rgba_f(0.50, 1.0, 0.50, 1);
00281         ALLEGRO_COLOR white = al_map_rgba_f(1, 1, 1, 1);
00282 
00283         /* Positions for the following columns:
00284          *  Action
00285          *  Key1
00286          *  Key2
00287          */
00288         c1 = x_pos - 100;
00289         c2 = x_pos + 20;
00290         c3 = x_pos + 100;
00291 
00292         int y = y_pos;
00293 
00294         /* Display the column headings */
00295         al_set_blender(ALLEGRO_ALPHA, ALLEGRO_INVERSE_ALPHA, bright);
00296         al_font_textout_centre(font, c1, y, "Action", -1);
00297         al_font_textout_centre(font, c2, y, "Key1", -1);
00298         al_font_textout_centre(font, c3, y, "Key2", -1);
00299 
00300         y += 24;
00301 
00302         /* Display the Action, then the key bindings for primary and secondary
00303          * inputs.
00304          */
00305         for (a = scroll_n; a < (n - scroll_n); ++a)
00306         {
00307                 al_set_blender(ALLEGRO_ALPHA, ALLEGRO_INVERSE_ALPHA, (a == 0) ? bright : white);
00308                 al_font_textout_centre(font, c1, y, defs[a].name, -1);
00309                 al_font_textout_centre(font, c2, y, al_keycode_to_name(defs[a].key1), -1);
00310                 al_font_textout_centre(font, c3, y, al_keycode_to_name(defs[a].key2), -1);
00311 
00312                 y += 20;
00313         }
00314 
00315 }

00318 
00319 Keyboard_menu::Keyboard_menu(Game* game)
00320 :Menu(game)
00321 ,option(0)
00322 {
00323         keyboard_defs.pos = keyb_pos_104;
00324         keyboard_defs.numkeys = 104;
00325         keyboard_defs.name = "English (UK) 104 key";
00326         keyboard_defs.w = 92;   //in 1/4 key units
00327         keyboard_defs.h = 27;
00328 
00329         large_font = al_ttf_load_font("media/DejaVuSans.ttf", 14, 0);
00330         small_font = al_ttf_load_font("media/DejaVuSans.ttf", 10, 0);
00331 
00340         keyboardStrings.push_back("Choose all");
00341         keyboardStrings.push_back("Load");
00342         keyboardStrings.push_back("Save");
00343         keyboardStrings.push_back("Exit");
00344 }

00346 
00347 void Keyboard_menu::Render()
00348 {
00349     ALLEGRO_COLOR green = al_map_rgba_f(0, 0.75, 0, 1);
00350     ALLEGRO_COLOR bright = al_map_rgba_f(0.50, 1.0, 0.50, 1);
00351         ALLEGRO_FONT* font = game->Get_font();
00352 
00353         draw_virtual_keyboard(keyboard_defs.pos, 32, 200,
00354                                   600.0 / keyboard_defs.w, 160.0 / keyboard_defs.h );
00355 
00356         draw_keyselect_table(game_control_defs, 5, 0, font, 320, 0);
00357 
00358         int fh = 20;
00359         int cx, y;
00360 
00361         /* Horizontally, slightly right of center */
00362         cx = al_get_display_width() * 3 / 4;
00363 
00364         /* Vertically, near the bottom of the screen */
00365         y = al_get_display_height() - fh * keyboardStrings.size();
00366 
00367         if(font)
00368         {
00369                 int sizeKeyboard = keyboardStrings.size();
00370                 for (int selectionIndex = 0; selectionIndex < sizeKeyboard; ++selectionIndex)
00371                 {
00372                         al_set_blender(ALLEGRO_ALPHA, ALLEGRO_INVERSE_ALPHA, (option == selectionIndex) ? bright : green );
00373                         al_font_textout_centre(font, cx, y + fh * selectionIndex,
00374                                                                    keyboardStrings[selectionIndex].c_str(), -1);
00375                 }
00376 
00377                 al_set_blender(ALLEGRO_ALPHA, ALLEGRO_INVERSE_ALPHA, bright );
00378                 al_font_textout_centre(font, cx - 120, y + fh * option, "▶⚔", -1);
00379                 al_font_textout_centre(font, cx + 120, y + fh * option, "⚔◀", -1);
00380 /*              al_font_textout(font, "Some unicode symbols:", 50, 240);
00381                 al_font_textout(font, "■□▢▣▤▥▦▧▨▩▪▫▬▭▮▯▰▱", 50, 260);
00382                 al_font_textout(font, "▲△▴▵▷▸▹►▻▼▽▾▿◀◁◂◃◄◅◆◇◈◉◊", 50, 280);
00383                 al_font_textout(font, "○◌◍◎●◐◑◒◓◔◕◖◗◘◙", 50, 300);
00384 */      }
00385         al_set_blender(ALLEGRO_ALPHA, ALLEGRO_INVERSE_ALPHA, al_map_rgba_f(1, 1, 1, 1));
00386 }

00388 
00389 
00390 game_event_n Keyboard_menu::Event(ALLEGRO_EVENT event)
00391 {
00392         game_event_n ret = GAME_EVENT_NONE;
00393 
00394         if (ALLEGRO_EVENT_KEY_DOWN == event.type)
00395         {
00396                 switch (event.keyboard.keycode)
00397                 {
00398                 case ALLEGRO_KEY_UP:
00399                         --option;
00400                         if (option < 0)
00401                         {
00402                                 option = keyboardStrings.size() - 1;
00403                         }
00404                         break;
00405                         
00406                 case ALLEGRO_KEY_DOWN:
00407                         ++option;
00408                         if (option >= (int)keyboardStrings.size())
00409                         {
00410                                 option = 0;
00411                         }
00412                         break;
00413                 case ALLEGRO_KEY_ENTER:
00414                 case ALLEGRO_KEY_SPACE:
00415                         switch (option)
00416                         {
00417                         case 0:
00418                                 choose_mode = 1;
00419                                 break;
00420                                 
00421                         case 1:
00422                                 ret = GAME_EVENT_OPTIONS_MENU;
00423                                 break;
00424                                 
00425                         case 2:
00426                                 ret = GAME_EVENT_OPTIONS_MENU;
00427                                 break;
00428                                 
00429                         case 3:
00430                                 ret = GAME_EVENT_OPTIONS_MENU;
00431                                 break;
00432                                 
00433                         default:
00434                                 break;
00435                         }
00436                         break;
00437                 }
00438         }
00439         
00440         return ret;
00441 }
